name: Story 4: Champagne Drive
description:
Day 4. I don't know why I spend so much time on this game.  I suddenly wanted to do a period drama, coming of age story and I forgot that those stories are just not suitable for the short storytelling format.

Anyway, I'll try to speedrun the concept of growing up another day.

Recap:

A runway goes into the first train going anywhere, hoping to find an answer for anything.

Recommend song: Chinese New Year, by the Sales.

Cover: An old book, idk.
